channel.title: Game opens, and promptly closes again.
channel.description:
I've been having some difficulty with my game. It worked perfectly fine before but my game was windowed [b]with border[/b], so I closed it and added -noborder to the launch options.
Game no longer worked and I was stuck with a game that opened, and then immediately closed again. Removed the -noborder line, still no luck.
Removed the game, reinstalled, no luck. (5 times).
currently clueless :frowning: . Edit: No crash dump either.

item.title: Game opens, and promptly closes again.
item.dc:creator: Ramble
item.description:
I managed to fix it. If you set the launch options to contain the command “-safe” without the quotations marks and launch the game once it should launch in a really low resolution. Set the resolution to whatever you prefer, close the game and you can remove the launch option and it should run fine.
